text: The Frank Brooder House, at 303 North St. in Fromberg, Montana, was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1993. It is a brick two-and-a- half-story square-plan Colonial Revival-style house with a hipped roof, on a brick foundation. The brick is laid in English bond. title: Frank Brooder House
